Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Liger*?
Options:
A. a) Ananya Panday was cast opposite Vijay Deverakonda.
B. b) Vijay Deverakonda portrayed a MMA fighter in the film.
C. c) Ananya Panday played a role as a MMA fighter.
D. d) Vijay Deverakonda underwent a dramatic physical transformation for his role.
Answer: a) Ananya Panday was cast opposite Vijay Deverakonda. & b) Vijay Deverakonda portrayed a MMA fighter in the film. & d) Vijay Deverakonda underwent a dramatic physical transformation for his role.

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the casting for the film *Liger*?
Options:
A. Janhvi Kapoor was originally considered for a role in *Liger*.
B. Ananya Panday was cast opposite Vijay Deverakonda.
C. Vijay Deverakonda was the lead actor in *Liger*.
D. All of the above
